roleset.name: look for
roleset.note: SEEK-V NOTES: Member of VNcls hunt-35.1 (from seek.01-v)
SEEKING-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry seek.01. Corresponds VNcls ferret-35.6. (from seeking.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Northeast is seeking approval of its possible purchase of PS of New Hampshire.
example.arg: approval of its possible purchase of PS of New Hampshire

example.name: arg1 as action
example.text: A company is seeking *trace* to purchase a carrier.

example.name: with sought-from
example.text: Czechoslovakia is seeking $2 billion from Hungary.

example.name: No sought-from
example.text: Her seeking of the office of mayor of Arlington offers our community a candidate with the potential to continue the wonderful legacy.
example.arg: of the office of mayor of Arlington

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Jacqui's success is her father's preparation, her own determination and her seeking of assistance when needed from trusted advisors.

roleset.name: search diligently for
roleset.note: SEEK_OUT-V NOTES: See Vncls ferret-35.6. (from seek.02-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Country funds seek out individual companies.
